meanings.sent1: The bombination of the fireworks filled the night sky with excitement.
meanings.sent2: The bombination of the bees could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The bombination of the old car made it seem like it was singing along with the radio.
meanings.sent4: The bombination of the thunder shook the windows with its power.
meanings.sent5: The bombination of the bass drum reverberated through the concert hall.

meanings.definition: The act of producing a loud, resonant noise.
meanings.sent1: The bombination of the construction work could be heard throughout the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The bombination of the church bells signaled the start of the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The bombination of the children playing outside was music to the ears of the parents.
meanings.sent4: The bombination of the train passing by echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The bombination of the gong marked the beginning of the meditation session.
